text: @JamyeShah @judypapineau @GovernorTomWolf No, not a doctor, I have just listened to countless doctors make the same claim...including Dr. Fauci himself.  You’re blind and need to do some research outside of mainstream media.  Masks do NOTHING and I will not wear one.  Learn to think for yourself.
